item.title: Tofu Stir Fry
item.description: A vegetarian dish that is easy to make and very flavorful. Goes well with rice or noodles Serves 3 to 5. Cooking time: ~10 to 20 minutes Ingredients One block of extra firm tofu Three eggs Vegetables per your choice, recommendations include: Sugar snap peas Chopped cabbage Sliced carrots Broccoli Cauliflower Soy or teriyaki sauce 2 tbsp minced garlic Coconut oil Directions (Optional) Deep freeze tofu at least 24 hours prior and then thaw.
